column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Lance - Thank you very much for your review. I'm glad we were able to take care of this particular situation in a manner that met your satisfaction. We don't always hit the mark in terms of food and/or service (not for lack of effort)
column2: so it's always nice to get such excellent feedback from our customers. But above all
column3: I am happy you enjoyed our ramen
column4: and we most definitely look forward to serving you again soon.
